title: Supplies of the Mark (4R290)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Add (2) and place a villager from hand beneath your draw deck to heal a [Rohan] ally.
Lore:	”'This is all we could save, my Lady.'”
Rarity:	R
